titleStmt.title: The procession a poem on Her Majesties funeral / by a gentleman of the army.
titleStmt.author: Steele, Richard, Sir, 1672-1729.

notesStmt.note: Another edition published in 1695 has imprint: Printed for Thomas Bennet ...
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Cf. Wise, T.J. The Ashley library. 1922-1936. v. 5, p. 199
